display_long_description:
Quarantine Protocol: Infection Zone VR plunges you into a hyper-realistic, post-apocalyptic world where a deadly virus threatens to consume humanity. As a frontline officer inside the quarantine zone, every choice you make — every test, every denial, every bullet fired — carries real consequences.

Built for full VR immersion, this first-person outbreak simulator blends strategic management, tense decision-making, and psychological horror. Man checkpoints, inspect survivors, manage staff, and allocate scarce resources as you struggle to contain the infection and maintain order. The undead horde looms beyond the gates, and a single mistake could unleash chaos.

Feel the weight of moral choices in real time — save the innocent or protect the mission. Upgrade your facilities, train personnel, and fortify your base against rising threats. Each action shapes the world around you in a consequence-driven narrative filled with tension, suspense, and human drama.

With its deeply atmospheric environments, tactile interactions, and a unique gameplay loop combining survival strategy, ethical decision-making, and immersive simulation, Quarantine Protocol: Infection Zone VR delivers a gripping and unforgettable Meta Horizon experience where every heartbeat matters — and every choice has a cost.
